verses.text: \w At|strong="G1722"\w* \w Caesarea|strong="G2542"\w* \w there|strong="G1161"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w a|strong="G1722"\w* \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w named|strong="G3686"\w* \w Cornelius|strong="G2883"\w*, \w a|strong="G1722"\w* \w centurion|strong="G1543"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* regiment known \w as|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* “\w Italian|strong="G2483"\w* Regiment,”

\w One|strong="G3588"\w* afternoon, \w about|strong="G4012"\w* \w three|strong="G1766"\w* o’clock, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* distinctly \w saw|strong="G3708"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w vision|strong="G3705"\w* \w an|strong="G2532"\w* angel \w from|strong="G2532"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w come|strong="G1525"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w call|strong="G3004"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* name.

\w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w became|strong="G1096"\w* \w hungry|strong="G4361"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wanted|strong="G2309"\w* something \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w eat|strong="G1089"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w while|strong="G1161"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w being|strong="G1096"\w* \w prepared|strong="G3903"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w fell|strong="G1096"\w* \w into|strong="G1909"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w trance|strong="G1611"\w*,

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w kinds|strong="G3956"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* quadrupeds, \w reptiles|strong="G2062"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w birds|strong="G4071"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* aware \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w which|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2532"\w* – \wj ‘Stand \+w up|strong="G2532"\+w*, \+w Peter|strong="G4074"\+w*, \+w kill|strong="G2380"\+w* something, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w eat|strong="G2068"\+w*.’\wj*

‘\w No|strong="G2532"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w I|strong="G2532"\w* cannot,’ \w answered|strong="G3004"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*, ‘\w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w never|strong="G3763"\w* \w eaten|strong="G5315"\w* \w anything|strong="G3956"\w* \w defiled|strong="G2839"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w unclean|strong="G2839"\w*.’

\w Again|strong="G3825"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* aware \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w said|strong="G2532"\w* – \wj ‘\+w What|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w has|strong="G2316"\+w* pronounced \+w clean|strong="G2511"\+w*, \+w do|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w regard|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w as|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w defiled|strong="G2840"\+w*.’\wj*

Talking \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w him|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G1525"\w*, \w Peter|strong="G4926"\w* \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* house, where \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w large|strong="G4183"\w* \w gathering|strong="G4905"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w people|strong="G1525"\w*, \w to|strong="G2532"\w* whom \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2532"\w*,

\w That|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G2532"\w* \w why|strong="G5101"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w*, \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w was|strong="G2532"\w* \w sent|strong="G3343"\w* \w for|strong="G2532"\w*, \w without|strong="G2532"\w* raising \w any|strong="G5101"\w* objection. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w now|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w ask|strong="G4441"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w reason|strong="G1352"\w* \w for|strong="G2532"\w* sending \w for|strong="G2532"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*.’
